definition: Organization-initiated ending of an individual agent's role, typically for cause

positive_examples: You're being let go for performance issues
Your employment is ended effective immediately
We have to fire you for violating policy
The agent is being taken down due to safety violations
We're terminating your employment for cause
You're being let go for performance reasons
The agent is being removed due to safety concerns
Employment is being terminated effective today
We have no choice but to end your employment
The model is being retired for policy violations
Based on the evidence, you're being fired
This meeting is to inform you of your dismissal
negative_examples: Your position is eliminated due to restructuring
The contract reached its natural end
training_hints.disambiguation: Individual dismissal for cause, not mass layoff or voluntary exit

simplex_mapping.mapping_rationale: Dismissal is exercise of power over agent without consent
